689b3da4970320e753bc1cb4.title: Content pillars
689b3da4970320e753bc1cb4.description:
1. **Study Support & Tips** – practical strategies for learning success.
2. **Exam Preparation** – focused guidance for GCSE & A-Level parents/students.
3. **Subject-Specific Help** – SEO-rich “how to” and “improve in…” guides.
4. **Parent Support** – helping parents support children’s learning at home.
5. **EdTech & Online Learning** – explaining benefits of group online tuition and tech tools.

689b3d6d987ab4d603e69e17.title: Primary objectives:
689b3d6d987ab4d603e69e17.description:
- Capture search intent from parents looking for help in core subjects.
- Build trust and authority by giving genuinely helpful, clear, and friendly content.
- Increase brand visibility so ClassTutor is remembered when tutoring is needed.
